items.title: openad on PyPI.org

items.title: OpenAD Tool Kit on Github
items.authors: :  The OpenAD tool kit is an open-source framework developed by IBM Research, aggregating a number of molecular science toolkits into a single API that can be accessed by command line, a Jupyter Notebook and (soon) an API.
